mapper.select: SELECT ip_filters FROM pms.token a , pms.user b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.token_type = 'A' AND a.expired_time IS NULL AND b.status = 0 AND a.token_id = #{applicationKey} AND b.role = #{role}
SELECT expired_time FROM pms.token a , pms.user b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.token_type = 'T' AND b.status = 0 AND a.token_id = #{applicationKey} AND b.role = #{role} AND expired_time >= now()
